snippet.title: MLS scores: Nick Rimando outplays the Timbers while Sporting KC wreck Montreal
snippet.description:
MLS scores: Nick Rimando outplays the Timbers while Sporting KC wreck Montreal by Kevin McCauley on Apr 20 2014, 12:39a
Did you know that Nick Rimando has never won MLS goalkeeper of the year? We've failed as a society.

snippet.title: MLS defender throws a nasty elbow, then dives
snippet.description:
MLS defender throws a nasty elbow, then dives by Zach Woosley on Apr 14 2014, 11:43a
It's the near perfect juxtaposition of violence and flopping.

snippet.title: USA vs. Mexico: Final score 2-2, positives for both sides
snippet.description:
USA vs. Mexico: Final score 2-2, positives for both sides by Kevin McCauley on Apr 3 2014, 1:34a
United States fans will likely be a bit disappointed about losing a 2-0 lead, but seeing as Wednesday's match against Mexico was a domestic-only, non-FIFA date friendly, Jurgen Klinsmann will deal...

snippet.title: MLS scores: RSL thrashes Toronto in a day full of late drama
snippet.description:
MLS scores: RSL thrashes Toronto in a day full of late drama by Ryan Rosenblatt on Mar 30 2014, 1:35a
There was no lack of drama in MLS on Saturday.

snippet.title: MLS Week 3: All smiles in Toronto and Dallas, less so in Kansas City and LA
snippet.description:
MLS Week 3: All smiles in Toronto and Dallas, less so in Kansas City and LA by Ryan Rosenblatt on Mar 24 2014, 5:14p
Week 3 was kind to some contenders, but not so much others.

snippet.title: MLS scores: Toronto and Columbus stay perfect, Portland still winless
snippet.description:
MLS scores: Toronto and Columbus stay perfect, Portland still winless by Ryan Rosenblatt on Mar 23 2014, 12:34a
Toronto FC's millions are paying off...so far.

snippet.title: Toluca vs. Earthquakes: Toluca prevails in penalties
snippet.description:
Toluca vs. Earthquakes: Toluca prevails in penalties by Jeremiah Oshan on Mar 19 2014, 10:54p
Earthquakes used a lineup severely diminished by injury and suspension and took it as far as they could go.

snippet.title: CONCACAF Champions League quarterfinals: Toluca, Cruz Azul headed to the semis
snippet.description:
CONCACAF Champions League quarterfinals: Toluca, Cruz Azul headed to the semis by Ryan Rosenblatt on Mar 18 2014, 11:07p
The Quakes were so close to advancing to the semifinals, but Toluca came away winners in penalties to join Tijuana and Cruz Azul in the next round.

snippet.title: MLS teams have three chances to flip the script in Mexico
snippet.description:
MLS teams have three chances to flip the script in Mexico by Jeremiah Oshan on Mar 18 2014, 6:20p
For all the talk of a closing gap, CONCACAF Champions League results make it clear which league dominates the region.

snippet.title: CONCACAF Champions League quarterfinals preview: Semifinalists to be decided
snippet.description:
CONCACAF Champions League quarterfinals preview: Semifinalists to be decided by Ryan Rosenblatt on Mar 18 2014, 8:01a
Four ties, four second legs and four semifinal places up for grabs.
